job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T17:39:21.000Z", "description": "

SUMMARY:

Research, design, and develop computer software systems compliant with systems-level interface, operational, and

performance requirements. Analyze systems and software requirements and elaborate them into designs within the

constraints of fidelity, quality, cost, and schedule. Develop and test software for these designs.


ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

\u2022 Analyze computer processing requirements. Specify and recommend the purchase of computational systems which

provide the computational capabilities required.

\u2022 Review program specifications and computational system specifications and consults project, systems, and

hardware engineers to identify and evaluate interface requirements between the hardware and software.

Define top-level interface requirements within the software consistent with system interfaces.

\u2022 Analyze operational and performance requirements of the overall system and define candidate top-level systems

and software design approaches consistent with these requirements. These analyses include consideration of

hardware computational capabilities, system latencies, spare time requirements, etc.

\u2022 Perform value engineering trade studies of candidate top-level design solutions to determine the optimum

solution given fidelity, quality, schedule, and cost constraints.

\u2022 Develop detailed systems and software designs via analyses, elaboration and decomposition of top-level interface,

operational, and performance requirements. Develop software computer code compliant with detailed design

requirements.

\u2022 Perform integration test, acceptance test, and delivery of software embedded products.

\u2022 Identify and manage risks to eliminate unplanned problems and minimize costs.

\u2022 Develop proposal inputs, technical reports, design specifications, test specifications, and test procedures as

required for assigned programs.

\u2022 Perform other related tasks as assigned by supervisor.


EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE:

Bachelors Degree (B.S.) in engineering, physics, or equivalent; up to 6 years related experience and/or training; or

equivalent combination of education and experience. Background must demonstrate a thorough knowledge of the

sciences underlying software engineering.


COMPUTER SKILLS:

  1. Bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Electrical Engineering (with a Software emphasis)
  2. 2-5 years and another position requiring 5+ years experience programming in C++
  3. Recent experience with Linux OS
  4. Experience with systems engineering processes, including requirements analysis, system architecture definition, and design, and system verification testing
  5. Relocation to Tulsa, Oklahoma.


CITIZENSHIP:

U.S. Citizenship. Must be able to obtain a Secret Level Clearance
